DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the comfort and blurriness of an investigational lubricant eye drop with a marketed lubricant eye gel.
DOC.brief_title: Acute Comfort and Blur Profile of a Lubricant Eye Drop Versus a Marketed Lubricant Eye Gel
DOC.criteria: Documented diagnosis of dry eye Must not have worn contact lenses within 12 hours preceding enrollment Must not have used any topical ocular drops or ointment within 24 hours preceding enrollment
